Content: Further hearings of the appeals petition filed by five persons including former Parliamentarian Duminda Silva sentenced to death was postponed for tomorrow. It was done when the petition was taken up today before a five judge bench headed by Chief Justice Priyasath Depp. The five including Duminda Silva were sentenced to death by the Colombo High Court on 08 September 2015 over the murder of four persons including former Parliamentarian Bharatha Lakshman Premachandra
